resources.string: You haven\'t set a passphrase yet!
This will permanently unlock Signal-LTS and message notifications.
Unregistering from Signal-LTS messages and calls…
Disable Signal-LTS messages and calls by unregistering from the server. You will need to re-register your phone number to use them again in the future.
Touch to change your default SMS app
Touch to make Signal your default SMS app
PINs are required for registration lock. To disable PINs, please first disable registration lock.
Before you can disable your PIN, you must record your payments recovery phrase to ensure you can recover your payments account.
Signal-LTS needs permission to show your photos and videos.
Can\'t find an app to select media.

Signal-LTS requires the Storage permission in order to attach photos, videos, or audio, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\".

Signal-LTS requires Contacts permission in order to attach contact information, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Contacts\".
Signal-LTS requires Location permission in order to attach a location, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Location\".
Blocked users will not be able to call you or send you messages.
\"%1$s\" will not be able to call you or send you messages.
You will no longer receive messages or updates from this group, and members won\'t be able to add you to this group again.
Group members won\'t be able to add you to this group again.
Group members will be able to add you to this group again.
You will be able to message and call each other and your name and photo will be shared with them.
Blocked people won\'t be able to call you or send you messages.
Tap for photo, hold for video
You can share with a maximum of %d conversations.
You can only use the camera button to send photos to Signal contacts.
Can\'t find who you\'re looking for?
Invite a contact to join Signal-LTS
This version of the app is no longer supported. To continue sending and receiving messages, update to the latest version.
Your version of Signal has expired. You can view your message history but you won\'t be able to send or receive messages until you update.
A cellular call is already in progress.
Carrier charges may apply. The number you are calling is not registered with Signal. This call will be placed through your mobile carrier, not over the internet.
Your safety number with %1$s has changed. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that %2$s simply reinstalled Signal.
You may wish to verify your safety number with this contact.
Received key exchange message, tap to process.
Send failed, tap for unsecured fallback
This message will not be encrypted because the recipient is no longer a Signal user.\n\nSend unsecured message?
Can\'t find an app able to open this media.
This may help if you\'re having encryption problems in this conversation. Your messages will be kept.
Sorry, there was an error setting your attachment.
Recipient is not a valid SMS or email address!
Tap here to start a group call
This device does not appear to support dial actions.
Attachment exceeds size limits for the type of message you\'re sending.
You can\'t send messages to this group because you\'re no longer a member.
There is no app available to handle this link on your device.
Your request to join has been sent to the group admin. You\'ll be notified when they take action.
To send audio messages, allow Signal-LTS access to your microphone.
Signal-LTS requires the Microphone permission in order to send audio messages, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\".

Signal-LTS needs the Microphone and Camera permissions in order to call %s, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\" and \"Camera\".
To capture photos and video, allow Signal-LTS access to the camera.
Signal-LTS needs the Camera permission to take photos or video, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\".
Signal-LTS needs Camera permissions to take photos or video
Enable the microphone permission to capture videos with sound.
Signal-LTS needs microphone permissions to record videos, but they have been denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\" and \"Camera\".
Signal-LTS needs microphone permissions to record videos.
Signal cannot send SMS/MMS messages because it is not your default SMS app. Would you like to change this in your Android settings?
This conversation will be deleted from all of your devices.
You will leave this group, and it will be deleted from all your devices.
To call %1$s, Signal-LTS needs access to your microphone
Look for GIFs next to emoji and stickers.

Your profile is end-to-end encrypted. Your profile and changes to it will be visible to your contacts, when you initiate or accept new conversations, and when you join new groups.

Viewing your gallery requires the storage permission.

By unlinking this device, it will no longer be able to send or receive messages.

This is likely because you registered your phone number with Signal on a different device. Tap to re-register.

Signal-LTS requires Microphone and Camera permissions in order to make or receive calls, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\" and \"Camera\".
Someone has joined this call with a safety number that has changed.

Signal-LTS requires the Contacts permission in order to display your contacts, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Contacts\".
Error retrieving contacts, check your network connection
"%1$s" is not a Signal user. Please check the username and try again.
You do not need to add yourself to the group
Signal groups can have a maximum of %1$d members.
Signal groups perform best with %1$d members or fewer. Adding more members will cause delays sending and receiving messages.
Signal-LTS needs access to your contacts in order to display them.
Message could not be sent. Check your connection and try again.
No groups in common. Review requests carefully.
No contacts in this group. Review requests carefully.
The disappearing message time will be set to %1$s when you message them.
The following people may have reinstalled or changed devices. Verify your safety number with them to ensure privacy.
To receive call notifications, tap here and turn on \"Show notifications.\"
To receive call notifications, tap here and turn on notifications and make sure Sound and Pop-up are enabled.
To receive call notifications, tap here and enable background activity in \"Battery\" settings.
To receive call notifications, tap Settings and turn on \"Show notifications.\"
To receive call notifications, tap Settings and turn on notifications and make sure Sound and Pop-up are enabled.
To receive call notifications, tap Settings and enable background activity in \"Battery\" settings.
Scan the QR code displayed on the device to link
Your safety number with %s has changed and is no longer verified
Your safety numbers with %1$s and %2$s are no longer verified
Your safety numbers with %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s are no longer verified
Your safety number with %1$s has changed and is no longer verified. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that %1$s simply reinstalled Signal.
Your safety numbers with %1$s and %2$s are no longer verified. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that they simply reinstalled Signal.
Your safety numbers with %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s are no longer verified. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that they simply reinstalled Signal.
Your safety number with %s just changed.
Your safety numbers with %1$s and %2$s just changed.
Your safety numbers with %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s just changed.
This log will be posted publicly online for contributors to view, you may examine and edit it before submitting.
Would you like to import your existing text messages into Signal\'s encrypted database?
The default system database will not be modified or altered in any way.
This could take a moment. Please be patient, we\'ll notify you when the import is complete.

Signal requires MMS settings to deliver media and group messages through your wireless carrier. Your device does not make this information available, which is occasionally true for locked devices and other restrictive configurations.

To send media and group messages, tap \'OK\' and complete the requested settings. The MMS settings for your carrier can generally be located by searching for \'your carrier APN\'. You will only need to do this once.
A message, sticker, reaction, or read receipt couldn\'t be delivered to you from %s. They may have tried sending it to you directly, or in a group.
A message, sticker, reaction, or read receipt couldn\'t be delivered to you from %s.
Custom MMS group names and photos will only be visible to you.
Group descriptions will be visible to members of this group and people who have been invited.
Write a few words about yourself…
Failed to save due to network issues. Try again later.

If you wish to verify the security of your encryption with %s, compare the number above with the number on their device. Alternatively, you can scan the code on their phone, or ask them to scan your code. Learn more.
Users can now choose to accept a new conversation. Profile names let people know who\'s messaging them.
Have you read our FAQ yet?
Tell us why you\'re reaching out.
Please be as descriptive as possible to help us understand the issue.
Use Signal for all incoming text messages
Use Signal for all incoming multimedia messages
Pressing the Enter key will send text messages
Display contact photos from your address book if available
Retrieve link previews directly from websites for messages you send.
Choose your contact entry from the contacts list.
Lock screen and notifications with a passphrase
Block screenshots in the recents list and inside the app
Auto-lock Signal after a specified time interval of inactivity
Request a delivery report for each SMS message you send
If you disable the PIN, you will lose all data when you re-register Signal unless you manually back up and restore. You can not turn on Registration Lock while the PIN is disabled.
PINs keep information stored with Signal encrypted so only you can access it. Your profile, settings, and contacts will restore when you reinstall. You won’t need your PIN to open the app.
Free private messages and calls to Signal users
Enable if your device uses SMS/MMS delivery over WiFi (only enable when \'WiFi Calling\' is enabled on your device)
If read receipts are disabled, you won\'t be able to see read receipts from others.
If typing indicators are disabled, you won\'t be able to see typing indicators from others.
Request keyboard to disable personalized learning.
This setting is not a guarantee, and your keyboard may ignore it.
This will permanently delete all message history and media from your device that are older than %1$s.
This will permanently trim all conversations to the %1$s most recent messages.
This will permanently delete all message history and media from your device.
Are you sure you want to delete all message history?
All message history will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.
Relay all calls through the Signal server to avoid revealing your IP address to your contact. Enabling will reduce call quality.
Using less data may improve calls on bad networks
Display invitation prompts for contacts without Signal
Show a status icon when you select "Message details" on messages that were delivered using sealed sender.
Enable sealed sender for incoming messages from non-contacts and people with whom you have not shared your profile.
Only use a proxy if you\'re not able to connect to Signal on mobile data or Wi-Fi.
Couldn\'t connect to the proxy. Check the proxy address and try again.
You are connected to the proxy. You can turn the proxy off at any time from Settings.
Do not attempt to create GV2 groups, i.e. will force creation of GV1 or MMS groups.
Members will not be added directly to a GV2 even if they could be.
Changes in server\'s response will be ignored, causing passive voice update messages if P2P is also ignored.
Changes sent P2P will be ignored. In conjunction with ignoring server changes, will cause passive voice.
Do not attempt to initiate an auto-migration. You will still recognize migrated groups.
Do not attempt to notify other users of an auto-migration. They will have to discover it on their own.
Copy all payment records to clipboard.
Forces a write of capabilities on to the server followed by a read.
Creates a new versioned profile, and triggers an update of any GV2 group you belong to.
Forces a refresh of remote values locally instead of waiting for the elapsed time
See more information about a user when viewing conversation settings.
Forces remote storage to match the local device state.
Force the app to behave as if it is in a country where Signal is censored.
Click to delete all dynamic shortcuts
Click to delete all sender key state
Click to delete all sharing state
Remove the requirement that you need at least 2 recipients to use sender key.
Delay resending messages in response to retry receipts by 10 seconds.
Use Signal-LTS to send and receive MobileCoin, a new privacy focused digital currency. Activate to get started.
Can\'t display currency conversion. Check your phone\'s connection and try again.
Payments is not available in your region.
Could not enable payments. Try again later.
You will not be able to send or receive MobileCoin in Signal-LTS if you deactivate payments.

You can use Signal-LTS to send and receive MobileCoin. All payments are subject to the Terms of Use for MobileCoins and the MobileCoin Wallet. This is a beta feature so you may encounter some issues and payments or balances you may lose can\'t be recovered.
Payments in Signal-LTS is no longer available. You can still transfer funds to an exchange but you can no longer send and receive payments or add funds.
To add funds, send MobileCoin to your wallet address. Start a transaction from your account on an exchange that supports MobileCoin, then scan the QR code or copy your wallet address.
Transaction details including the payment amount and time of transaction are part of the MobileCoin Ledger.
A “coin cleanup fee” is charged when the coins in your possession can not be combined to complete a transaction. Cleanup will allow you to continue sending payments.
No further details available for this transaction
To: Scan or enter wallet address
You can transfer MobileCoin by completing a transfer to the wallet address provided by the exchange. The wallet address is the string of numbers and letters most commonly below the QR code.
Check the wallet address you\'re attempting to transfer to and try again.
You can\'t transfer to your own Signal-LTS wallet address. Enter the wallet address from your account at a supported exchange.
To scan a QR code, Signal-LTS needs access to the camera.
Signal-LTS needs the Camera permission to capture a QR code. Go to settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\".
To scan a QR code, Signal-LTS needs access to the camera.
Scan the address QR code of the payee
Conversions are just estimates and may not be accurate.
This person has not activated payments
Unable to request a network fee. To continue this payment tap okay to try again.
You can only pin up to %1$d chats
No chats yet.\nGet started by messaging a friend.
Tap to copy your phone\'s SMS messages into Signal\'s encrypted database.
Signal is experiencing technical difficulties. We are working hard to restore service as quickly as possible.
Signal Protocol automatically protected %1$d%% of your outgoing messages over the past %2$d days. Conversations between Signal users are always end-to-end encrypted.
Your Insights percentage is calculated based on outgoing messages within the past %1$d days that have not disappeared or been deleted.
Start communicating securely and enable new features that go beyond the limitations of unencrypted SMS messages by inviting more contacts to join Signal.
These statistics were locally generated on your device and can only be seen by you. They are never transmitted anywhere.
Find out how many of your outgoing messages were sent securely, then quickly invite new contacts to boost your Signal percentage.
You could increase the number of encrypted messages you send by %1$d%%

PIN must be at least %1$d characters

PIN must be at least %1$d digits

resources.string: You can change your PIN as long as this device is registered.
PINs keep information stored with Signal encrypted so only you can access it. Your profile, settings, and contacts will restore when you reinstall. You won\'t need your PIN to open the app.
Your PIN was not saved. We\'ll prompt you to create a PIN later.
PINs keep information stored with Signal encrypted so only you can access it. Your profile, settings, and contacts will restore when you reinstall. You won\'t need your PIN to open the app.
Your Registration Lock is now called a PIN, and it does more. Update it now.
To help you memorize your PIN, we\'ll ask you to enter it periodically. We ask you less over time.

Your account has been locked to protect your privacy and security. After %1$d days of inactivity in your account you\'ll be able to re-register this phone number without needing your PIN. All content will be deleted.
Enter the PIN you created for your account. This is different from your SMS verification code.
Signal Registration - Need Help with PIN for Android (v1 PIN)
Signal Registration - Need Help with PIN for Android (v2 PIN)

plurals.name: RegistrationLockFragment__for_your_privacy_and_security_there_is_no_way_to_recover
plurals.item: For your privacy and security, there is no way to recover your PIN. If you can\'t remember your PIN, you can re-verify with SMS after %1$d day of inactivity. In this case, your account will be wiped and all content deleted.

For your privacy and security, there is no way to recover your PIN. If you can\'t remember your PIN, you can re-verify with SMS after %1$d days of inactivity. In this case, your account will be wiped and all content deleted.

plurals.name: RegistrationLockFragment__if_you_run_out_of_attempts_your_account_will_be_locked_for_d_days
plurals.item: If you run out of attempts your account will be locked for %1$d day. After %1$d day of inactivity, you can re-register without your PIN. Your account will be wiped and all content deleted.
If you run out of attempts your account will be locked for %1$d days. After %1$d days of inactivity, you can re-register without your PIN. Your account will be wiped and all content deleted.

resources.string: %1$s will get a message request from you. You can call once your message request is accepted.
PINs keep information that’s stored with Signal encrypted.
To make Signal the best messaging app on the planet, we\'d love to hear your feedback.

We believe in privacy.

Signal doesn\'t track you or collect your data. To improve Signal for everyone, we rely on user feedback, and we\'d love yours.

We\'re running a survey to understand how you use Signal. Our survey doesn\'t collect any data that will identify you. If you’re interested in sharing additional feedback, you\'ll have the option to provide contact information.

If you have a few minutes and feedback to offer, we\'d love to hear from you.
The survey is hosted by Alchemer at the secure domain surveys.signalusers.org
Signal needs SMS permission in order to send an SMS, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\" and enable \"SMS\".
Backups will be saved to external storage and encrypted with the passphrase below. You must have this passphrase in order to restore a backup.
You must have this passphrase in order to restore a backup.
I have written down this passphrase. Without it, I will be unable to restore a backup.
Transfer account to a new Android device
Cannot import backups from newer versions of Signal
Restore your messages and media from a local backup. If you don\'t restore now, you won\'t be able to restore later.
Please acknowledge your understanding by marking the confirmation check box.
Disable and delete all local backups?
To enable backups, choose a folder. Backups will be saved to this location.
Enter your backup passphrase to verify
You successfully entered your backup passphrase
Your backup directory has been deleted or moved.
Your backup file is too large to store on this volume.
There is not enough space to store your backup.
Signal Registration - Verification Code for Android
Your phone number will be visible to all people and groups you message.
Anyone who has your phone number in their contacts will see you as a contact on Signal. Others will be able to find you in search.
Lock Signal access with Android screen lock or fingerprint
PINs keep information stored with Signal encrypted so only you can access it. Your profile, settings, and contacts will restore when you reinstall Signal.
Add extra security by requiring your Signal PIN to register your phone number with Signal again.
Reminders help you remember your PIN since it can\'t be recovered. You\'ll be asked less frequently over time.
Make sure you memorize or securely store your PIN as it can\'t be recovered. If you forget your PIN, you may lose data when re-registering your Signal account.
You must enter your Registration Lock PIN
Your PIN has at least %d digits or characters
You\'ve made too many incorrect Registration Lock PIN attempts. Please try again in a day.
You\'ve made too many attempts. Please try again later.
If you have previously registered a Signal account, you can transfer or restore your account and messages
Transfer your account and messages from your old Android device. You need access to your old device.
You need access to your old device.
Restore your messages from a local backup. If you don’t restore now, you won\'t be able to restore later.
Open Signal on your old Android phone
Tap on your profile photo in the top left to open Settings
Tap "Transfer Account" and then "Continue" on both devices
Preparing to connect to old Android device…
Taking a moment, should be ready soon
Waiting for old Android device to connect…
Signal-LTS needs the location permission to discover and connect to your old Android device.
Signal-LTS needs location services enabled to discover and connect with your old Android device.
Signal-LTS needs Wi-Fi on to discover and connect with your old Android device. Wi-Fi needs to be on but it does not have to be connected to a Wi-Fi network.

Sorry, it appears this device does not support Wi-Fi Direct. Signal-LTS uses Wi-Fi Direct to discover and connect with your old Android device. You can still restore a backup to restore your account from your old Android device.
An unexpected error occurred while attempting to connect to your old Android device.
Signal-LTS needs the location permission to discover and connect to your new Android device.
Signal-LTS needs location services enabled to discover and connect with your new Android device.
Signal-LTS needs Wi-Fi on to discover and connect with your new Android device. Wi-Fi needs to be on but it does not have to be connected to a Wi-Fi network.

Sorry, it appears this device does not support Wi-Fi Direct. Signal-LTS uses Wi-Fi Direct to discover and connect with your new Android device. You can still create a backup to restore your account on your new Android device.
An unexpected error occurred while attempting to connect to your new Android device.
Unable to open Wi-Fi Settings. Please turn on Wi-Fi manually.
Verify that the code below matches on both of your devices. Then tap continue.
If the numbers on your devices do not match, it\'s possible you connected to the wrong device. To fix this, stop the transfer and try again, and keep both of your devices close.
Make sure the following permissions and services are enabled:
On the WiFi Direct screen, remove all remembered groups and unlink any invited or connected devices.
Try turning Wi-Fi off and on, on both devices.
Make sure both devices are in transfer mode.
Tap Continue on your other device to start the transfer.
Tap Continue on your other device…
Cannot transfer from a newer versions of Signal
Keep both devices near each other. Do not turn off the devices and keep Signal-LTS open. Transfers are end-to-end encrypted.
All transfer progress will be lost.
You can transfer your Signal account when setting up Signal on a new Android device. Before continuing:
Download Signal-LTS on your new Android device
Select "Transfer from Android device" when prompted and then "Continue". Keep both devices nearby.
Your Signal data has been transferred to your new device. To complete the transfer process, you must continue registration on your new device.
To complete the transfer process, you must continue registration.
Preparing to connect to your other Android device…
Preparing to connect to your other Android device…
Searching for your other Android device…
Connecting to your other Android device…
Complete registration on your new device
Your Signal account has been transferred to your new device, but you must complete registration on it to continue. Signal will be inactive on this device.
You have a balance of %1$s. If you do not transfer your funds to another wallet address before deleting your account, you will lose it forever.
"%1$s" will be able to edit this group and its members.
Legacy Groups are groups that are not compatible with New Group features like admins and more descriptive group updates.
Can I upgrade a Legacy Group?
Legacy Groups can\'t yet be upgraded to New Groups, but you can create a New Group with the same members if they\'re on the latest version of Signal.
Signal will offer a way to upgrade Legacy Groups in the future.
Anyone with this link can view the group\'s name and photo and request to join. Share it with people you trust.
Anyone with this link can view the group\'s name and photo and join the group. Share it with people you trust.
The link is not currently active
%1$d group members have the same name, review the members below and choose to take action.
If you\'re not sure who the request is from, review the contacts below and take action.
Recently changed their profile name from %1$s to %2$s
Delete your account info and profile photo
The phone number you entered doesn\'t match your account\'s.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
This will delete your Signal account and reset the application. The app will close after the process is complete.
Failed to delete account. Do you have a network connection?
Failed to delete local data. You can manually clear it in the system application settings.
Sharing to multiple chats is only supported for Signal messages
Failed to send to some users
You can only share with up to %1$d chats
Would you like to override all chat colors?
Would you like to override all wallpapers?
Viewing your gallery requires the storage permission.
Pinch to zoom, drag to adjust.
MobileCoin is a new privacy focused digital currency.
You can add funds for use in Signal-LTS by sending MobileCoin to your wallet address.
You can cash out MobileCoin anytime on an exchange that supports MobileCoin. Just make a transfer to your account at that exchange.
Your recovery phrase gives you another way to restore your payments account.
With a high balance, you may want to update to an alphanumeric PIN to add more protection to your account.

It\'s recommended that you transfer your funds to another wallet address before deactivating payments. If you choose not to transfer your funds now, they will remain in your wallet linked to Signal-LTS if you reactivate payments.
Your balance will remain in your wallet linked to Signal-LTS if you choose to reactivate payments.

Your balance will automatically restore when you reinstall Signal if you confirm your Signal PIN. You can also restore your balance using a recovery phrase, which is a %1$d-word phrase unique to you. Write it down and store it in a safe place.
Your recovery phrase is a %1$d-word phrase unique to you. Use this phrase to restore your balance.
Make sure you\'ve entered %1$d words and try again.
Write down the following %1$d words in order. Store your list in a secure place.
Make sure you\'ve entered your phrase correctly.
Do not screenshot or send by email.
Make sure you\'ve entered your phrase correctly and try again.
If you choose to store your recovery phrase digitally, ensure it is securely stored somewhere you trust.
Enter the following words from your recovery phrase.
To send a payment to this user they need to accept a message request from you. Send them a message to create a message request.
You have no groups in common with this person. Review requests carefully before accepting to avoid unwanted messages.
None of your contacts or people you chat with are in this group. Review requests carefully before accepting to avoid unwanted messages.
Here\'s a preview of the chat color.
The color is visible to only you.
You\'ll be asked less frequently over time
Require your Signal PIN to register your phone number with Signal again
Block screenshots in the recents list and inside the app
Signal messages and calls, always relay calls, and sealed sender
Set a default disappearing message timer for all new chats started by you.
Show an icon in message details when they were delivered using sealed sender.
When enabled, new messages sent and received in new chats started by you will disappear after they have been seen.
When enabled, new messages sent and received in this chat will disappear after they have been seen.
